properties.body:
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V DISCOVERER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLE:
   A. 02 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      10-55S 11-00S AND 036-15W 036-25W.
   B. 03 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      10-30S 10-40S AND 034-50w 035-00W.
   C. 04 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      10-55S 11-05S AND 035-40W 035-50W.
   D. 05 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      11-10S 11-20S AND 035-40W 035-50W.
   E. 06 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      11-25S 11-35S AND 035-40W 035-50W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 07 FEB.
